
1. Calcule une table de exp(x)
pour x -> 0
x    exp(x)
1.00000000000000000e+00, 2.71828182845904509e+00
1.00000000000000002e-02, 1.01005016708416795e+00
1.00000000000000005e-04, 1.00010000500016671e+00
9.99999999999999955e-07, 1.00000100000049996e+00
1.00000000000000002e-08, 1.00000000999999994e+00
1.00000000000000004e-10, 1.00000000010000001e+00
9.99999999999999980e-13, 1.00000000000100009e+00
9.99999999999999999e-15, 1.00000000000000999e+00
9.99999999999999979e-17, 1.00000000000000000e+00
1.00000000000000007e-18, 1.00000000000000000e+00

2. Comparer exp(x)-1 vs expm1(x)

x= 1e-10
Exact= 1.00000000005e-10
With exp( 1e-10 )-1
    Computed= 1.000000082740371e-10
    Relative Error= 8.269037099242213e-08
    Number of Signif. Digits= 7.082545059592886
With expm1( 1e-10 )
    Computed = 1.00000000005e-10
    Relative Error= 0.0
    Number of Signif. Digits= 15.954589770191001

x= 1e-20
Exact= 1e-20
With exp( 1e-20 )-1
    Computed= 0.0
    Relative Error= 1.0
    Number of Signif. Digits= 0
With expm1( 1e-20 )
    Computed = 1e-20
    Relative Error= 0.0
    Number of Signif. Digits= 15.954589770191001

3. Evolution du conditionnement de exp(x)-1
